T17vtrksopu:410: pratiṣedhyānāṃ romaharṣādiviśeṣānāṃ kāraṇaṃ śītaṃ tasya viruddho 'gnis tasya kāryaṃ dhūmas tasya cehopabdhiḥ /
T17vtrksopu:414: pratiṣedhyasya tuṣārasparśasya vyāpakaṃ śītaṃ tasya viruddho 'gnis tasya kāryaṃ dhūmas tasya cehopalabdhiḥ /
T17vtrksopu:415: 16) kāryaviruddhakāryopalabdhir yathā nehāpratibaddhasāmarthyāni śītakāraṇāni santi dhūmād iti /
T17vtrksopu:416: pratiṣedhyānāṃ śītakāraṇānāṃ kāryaṃ śītaṃ tasya viruddho 'gnis tasya kāryaṃ dhūmas tasya cehopalabdhiḥ //
T17vtrksopu:422: tathā svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhyādāv apy anupalabdhirūpatā vidyata eva /
T17vtrksopu:423: sahābhāvākṣepikā yasyopalabdhiḥ sā tasyānupalabdhir ity anupalabdhilakṣaṇayogāt /
T17vtrksopu:424: tathā hi yeyaṃ vahner upalabdhiḥ sā śītābhāvam ākṣipati /
T17vtrksopu:425: 11. bhavatv anupalabdhiḥ sā dṛśyatā tu katham /
T17vtrksopu:428: tathā hi yadi śītasparśo dṛśyo bhavet tadā tasyopalabdhiṃ niṣedhyābhāvavyāpto vahnir viruṇaddhy eva /
T17vtrksopu:432: yasyāṃ tv anupalabdhau tadaiva tam eva pratipattāraṃ prati dṛśyatvaṃ pratiṣedhyasya siddhaṃ dṛśyānupalabdhir eva tasyāḥ svalakṣaṇam iti sākṣāt svabhāvānupalabdhiḥ /
T17vtrksopu:434: yady api saṃpratitanī dṛśyānupalabdhir nāsti virodhādikāle tv āsīd saiva bhāvapratipattinibandhanam iti /
T17vtrksopu:436: saṃpratitanyaś ca dṛśyānupalabdher abhāvāt tatsvabhāvānupalabdher anyāsām anupalabdhīnāṃ bheda iti /
T17vtrksopu:437: 12. yad api kaiścit svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhyādīnām anumitānumānatayā dṛśyānupalabdhirūpatocyate /
T17vtrksopu:438: dūrād vahne rūpaviśeṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā uṣṇasparśaviśeṣas taddeśavyāpako 'numīyate tasmāc ca śītasparśābhāvapratītiḥ /
T17vtrksopu:439: āhatya tu dṛśyānupalabdher anudayād dṛśyānupalabdher bhedena nirdeśaḥ /
T17vtrksopu:440: ata eva cānumitānumānam etat kevalam atyantābhyāsāj jhaṭiti tathābhūtapratītyudaye saty ekam anumānam ucyate /
T17vtrksopu:441: vastutas tv anekam anumānam etat evam anyatrāpi vyāpakaviruddhopalambhādāv ūhyam iti dvayam apy etan na manasi toṣam ādadhāti //
T17vtrksopu:443: yo hetor ātmanaḥ sattām apekṣya vidyamāno na hetusattāvyatiriktaṃ kiṃcid dhetum apekṣate /
T17vtrksopu:445: anena ca viśeṣaṇe nāntyāt kāraṇāt kāryaṃ yad utpadyate tasya saṃgrahaḥ (Ts 294) kṛtaḥ /
T17vtrksopu:446: tad api hi tasya svabhāva eva /
T17vtrksopu:448: anyārtham api kṛtam anyārthaṃ bhavatīti nyāyāt paravipratipattir api nirākṛtā /
T17vtrksopu:449: pare hi paścātkālabhāvinam api kṛtakatvādidharmaṃ svabhāvam icchantīti /
T17vtrksopu:451: kāryaṃ yāvadbhiḥ svabhāvair avinābhāvi kāraṇe hetur iti prakṛtam /
T17vtrksopu:452: kāraṇe sādhye yāvadbhiḥ svabhāvair avinābhāvi tair eva hetuḥ /
T17vtrksopu:456: sādhyaś ca vidhiḥ pratiṣedho vā anyonyalakṣaṇavyavacchedalakṣaṇatvād anayoḥ /
T17vtrksopu:459: arthāntare tu gamye kāryam iti dvāv etau vidhisādhanau /
T17vtrksopu:462: yasmāt svabhāvapratibandhe sati sādhanārthaḥ sādhyārthaṃ gamayet /
T17vtrksopu:464: nanu svabhāvapratibandham antareṇāpi candrodayāt kumudavikāsapratipattiḥ samudravṛddhiś ca /
T17vtrksopu:467: tat katham ucyate svabhāvapratibandhe saty artho 'rthaṃ gamayed iti /
T17vtrksopu:471: yo yatra svabhāvena na pratibaddhaḥsa tarn apratibaddhaviṣayam avaśyam eva na na vyabhicaratīti nāsti tayor avyabhicāraniyamaḥ /
T17vtrksopu:473: tathā hi hetudharmasyaiva tādṛśo 'trānumitir yatrāmbhojabodhādaya ekakālā jātāḥ /
T17vtrksopu:475: vāyuviśeṣa eva ca yaḥ kṛttikādyudayakāraṇaṃsa eva hi saṃtatyā rohiṇyādyudayakāraṇaṃ /
T17vtrksopu:488: svabhāvapratibandhe hi saty artho 'rthaṃ gamayed iti /
T17vtrksopu:497: pūrvam uktaṃ yat trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ tasya yat prakāśakaṃ vacanaṃ tat parārtham anumānaṃ kāraṇe kāryopacārāt /
T17vtrksopu:506: visadṛśo dharmo yasya sa vidharmā tasya bhāvo vaidharmyam /
T17vtrksopu:509: yasya ca vaidharmyam abhidheyaṃ tad vaidharmyavat /
T17vtrksopu:510: nanu ca sādharmyavati sādhanavākye vyatireko nāsti /
T17vtrksopu:511: vaidharmyavati cānvayas tat kathaṃ trirūpaliṅgākhyānaṃ parārtham anumānaṃ syāt /
T17vtrksopu:515: sādharmyābhidheyena yukte prayoge samarthyād vyatirekasya pratītis tasmāt trirūpaliṅgākhyānam /
T17vtrksopu:516: tasmin vyatireke buddhyāvasīyamāne 'sati sādhyena hetor anvayasya buddhyāvasitasyābhāvāt //
T17vtrksopu:520: tatheti yathānvayavākye tathārthād eva vaidharmyeṇa prayoge 'nvayasyānabhidhīyamānasyāpi gatiḥ /
T17vtrksopu:521: asati tasminn anvaye buddhigṛhīte sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvasyāsiddher anavasāyāt /
T17vtrksopu:522: tasmād ekenāpi vākyenānvayamukhena vyatirekamukhena vā prayuktena sapakṣāsapakṣayor liṅgasya sadasattvakhyāpanaṃ kṛtaṃ bḥavatīti nāvaśyaṃ vākyadvayaprayogaḥ
T17vtrksopu:523: 4. tatrānupalabdheḥ sādharmyavān prayogaḥ yad yatropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ san nopalabhyate sa tatrāsadvyavahāraviṣayaḥ /
T17vtrksopu:525: nopalabhyate ca kvacitpradeśaviśeṣa upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpto ghaṭa iti /
T17vtrksopu:526: atra dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇaḥ śaśaśirasaḥ sādhyadharmiṇaś ca pradeśaviśeṣasyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptapratiṣedhyānupalambhahetukṛtaṃ sādṛśyam abhidheyam
T17vtrksopu:528: yat sat tat sarvam anityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ saṃś ca śabdaḥ /
T17vtrksopu:535: sā ca bhāvasyātmabhūtaiva kevalaṃ kalpanayā vyatirekiṇīva pradarśyate /
T17vtrksopu:536: yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ kṛtakaś ca śabda iti vyatiriktaviśeṣaṇasya /
T17vtrksopu:537: apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi svabhāvaniṣpattau bhāvaḥ kṛtaka iti /
T17vtrksopu:539: atra hi dṛṣṭāntadharmibhiḥ sādhyadharmiṇāṃ hetukṛtaṃ sādṛśyam abhidheyam /
T17vtrksopu:546: yatra yatra dhūmas tatra tatra vahnir yathā mahānase /
T17vtrksopu:548: atra dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇo mahānasasya sādhyadharmiṇaś ca pradeśaviśeṣasya dhūmahetukṛtaṃ sādṛśyam abhidheyam /
T17vtrksopu:549: ihāpi tribhir anupalambhair dvābhyāṃ pratyakṣābhyāṃ siddhe kāryakāraṇabhave kāraṇe sādhye kāryahetur vaktavyaḥ /
T17vtrksopu:554: atra hi dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇo nilaviśeṣasya sādhyadharmiṇaś ca pradeśasyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaniṣedhyānupalambhākhyahetukṛtaṃ vaisādṛśyam abhidheyam
T17vtrksopu:555: 7. svabhāvahetor vaidharmyavantaḥ prayogāḥ asaty anityatve nāsti kvacit sattvaṃ yathā gaganamaline /
T17vtrksopu:557: asaty anityatve na kvacid utpattimattvaṃ yathākāśe /
T17vtrksopu:559: asaty anityatve na kvacit kṛtakatvaṃ yathā kurmaromni /
T17vtrksopu:561: atra dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇā sādhyadharmiṇo hetukṛtaṃ vaisadṛśyam abhidheyam //
T17vtrksopu:563: asaty agnau na bhavaty eva dhūmo yathā mahāhrade /
T17vtrksopu:565: (Ts 299) atra dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇā sādhyadharmiṇo hetukṛtaṃ vaisadṛśyam abhidheyam //
T17vtrksopu:566: 9. trirūpaliṅgākhyānaṃ parārtham anumānam ity arthān na pakṣādivacanam anumānam uktaṃ bhavati /
T17vtrksopu:567: tatra pratijñā tāvan na sākṣāt sādhanam /
T17vtrksopu:569: artha eva hy arthaṃ gamayati pratibandhān /
T17vtrksopu:573: sādhyasādhanadharmaviśeṣopadarśanārtham anavayavabhūtāpi pratijñā dṛṣṭāntavat prayujyata iti cet / na /
T17vtrksopu:574: evaṃ hy anujñādivākyam api prayoktavyaṃ syāt /
T17vtrksopu:575: na hi tair vinā eva sādhanasya pravṛttir saṃbhavati /
T17vtrksopu:578: tathā hi yat kṛtakaṃ tat sarvam anityaṃ kṛtakaś ca śabda ity etāvanmātre prayukte 'nityaḥ śabda iti pratītir bhavaty evāntareṇa pratijñāvacanam
T17vtrksopu:582: asati hi pratijñānirdeśe pakṣāpekṣānibandhanaṃ trairūpyaṃ nāstīti /
T17vtrksopu:584: tathā hi pratijñāvacanam antareṇāpi sarvaṃ saṃpadyata eva /
T17vtrksopu:585: upanayanasya punar arthaḥ pakṣadharmavacanenaiva nirdiṣṭa iti na tatpūrvake tasya kaścid upayogaḥ /
T17vtrksopu:586: vyāptipūrvake vacane pakṣadharmavacanād eva tadarthasiddheḥ kim anenopanayena /
T17vtrksopu:596: asiddhau saṃdehe vā pratipādyasya pratipādakasya hetvābhāsaḥ /
T17vtrksopu:597: 11. tatraikasya rūpasya dharmisaṃbandhasyāsiddhau saṃdehe cāsiddho hetvābhāsaḥ /
T17vtrksopu:599: cetanās tarava iti sādhye sarvatvagapaharaṇe maraṇaṃ prativādyasiddham /
T17vtrksopu:601: acetanāḥ sukhādaya iti sādhya utpattimattvam anityatvaṃ vā sāṃkhyasya svayaṃvādino 'siddham /
T17vtrksopu:602: atra cotpattimattvam anityatvaṃ vā paryāyeṇa hetur na yugapat tathā hi parārtho hetūpanyāsaḥ /
T17vtrksopu:603: parasya cāsata utpāda utpattimattvaṃ sataś ca niranvayo vināśo 'nityatvaṃ siddham iti /
T17vtrksopu:605: yathā bāspādibhāvena saṃdigdho bhūtasaṃghāto 'gnisiddhau bhūtānāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ saṃghātaḥ samūho 'gnisiddhyartham upādīyamāno 'siddhaḥ /
T17vtrksopu:606: yathā ceha nikūñjemayūraḥ kekāyitād iti tadāpātadeśavibhrame /
T17vtrksopu:607: āpātanam āpātas tasya kekāyitasyāpāta utpādas tasya deśas tasya vibhramo bhrāntiḥ /
T17vtrksopu:608: atha vā āpataty āgacchaty asmād ity āpātaḥ /
T17vtrksopu:611: yat punar ucyate 'nyair āpāta āgamanam iti tad ayuktam /
T17vtrksopu:619: tasmād yady ayam ātmā sarvagato na bhavet /
T17vtrksopu:620: kathaṃ dakṣiṇāpatha upalabdhāḥ sukhādayo madhyadeśa upalabhyante /
T17vtrksopu:621: ākāśavad iti dṛṣṭānte ākāśasya guṇaḥ śabdaḥ /
T17vtrksopu:622: sa ca yathā vikāriṇi puruṣa upalabhyate tathānyatrāpīti /
T17vtrksopu:623: syād eṣa hetur yadi bauddhasya sarvatropalabhyamānaguṇatvam ātmanaḥ siddhaṃ syāt /
T17vtrksopu:627: yathā śabdasya nityatvādike dharme sādhye prameyatvādiko dharmaḥ sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sarvatraikadeśe ca vartamānaḥ /
T17vtrksopu:632: nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameyatvād ity atra nityatve sādhye prameyatvaṃ sapakṣavipakṣayor vartate /
T17vtrksopu:633: ekadeśe ca vartamāna ity atrāpi sapakṣavipakṣayor iti saṃbandhanīyaṃ /
T17vtrksopu:639: yo vā sapakṣavipakṣayor ekadeśavṛttiḥ sarvo 'sāv anaikāntiko hetvābhāsa iti /
T17vtrksopu:640: tatra prayatnānantariyakaḥ śabdo 'nityatvād ghaṭavad ity ayaṃ vipakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ /
T17vtrksopu:641: vidyuti vartamānatvād ākāśādāv avartamānatvāt sapakṣavyāpī tu bhavaty eva /
T17vtrksopu:650: asparśatvaṃ hi vipakṣaikadeśe buddhyādau sapakṣaikadeśe cākāśādau vartata ity ubhayapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ /
T17vtrksopu:653: yathā sarvajñaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimān veti sādhye vaktṛtvādiko dharmaḥ saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikaḥ /
T17vtrksopu:654: sarvatraikadeśe vā sarvajño vaktā nopalabhyata iti /
T17vtrksopu:659: sapakṣe sattvasyāsapakṣe cāsattvasya yathā kṛtakatvaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ ca nityatve sādhye viruddhahetvābhāsaḥ //
T17vtrksopu:661: anayoḥ (Ts 303) sapakṣe 'sattvam asapakṣe ca sattvam iti viparyayasiddhiḥ /
T17vtrksopu:663: dvayo rūpayor ekasyāsiddhāv aparasya ca saṃdehe 'naikāntikaḥ /
T17vtrksopu:668: yathā vītarāgaḥ sarvajño vā vaktṛtvād iti /
T17vtrksopu:670: sarvajñavītarāgayor viprakarṣād vacanādes tatra sattvam asattvaṃ vā saṃdigdham /
T17vtrksopu:673: na hi sātmakānatmakābhyām anyo rāśir asti yatra praṇādir vartate /
T17vtrksopu:677: 15. evam eteṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇāṃ ekaikasya dvayor dvayor vā rūpayor asiddhau saṃdehe ca yathāyogam asiddhaviruddhānaikāntikās trayo hetvābhāsāḥ
T17vtrksopu:682: tathā dvayor dvayor vā rūpayor asiddhau saṃdehe ca yathāyogam iti yathāsaṃbhavam /
T17vtrksopu:684: tathā sapakṣe sattvasyāsiddhau saṃdehe cānaikāntika uktaḥ /
T17vtrksopu:685: evam ekaikasya rūpasyāsiddhau saṃdehe cāsiddho 'naikāntikaś ca hetvābhāsa (Ts 304) uktaḥ /
T17vtrksopu:686: tathā dvayor dvayo rūpayor viparyayasiddhau viruddho hetvābhāsa uktaḥ /
T17vtrksopu:687: asapakṣe sattvasya ca saṃdehe vā 'naikāntika uktaḥ /
T17vtrksopu:688: tathā sapakṣāsapakṣayor api hetoḥ sadasattvasaṃdehe 'naikāntika eva /
T17vtrksopu:689: evaṃ dvayor dvayor asiddhau saṃdehe ca viruddho 'naikāntikaś ca hetvābhāsa iti /
T17vtrksopu:690: 16. nanu katham uktaṃ trayo hetvābhāsā iti /
T17vtrksopu:691: yāvatā vaiphalyam api hetoḥ pṛthagdūṣaṇam asti / tad uktam /
T17vtrksopu:692: sādhanaṃ yad vivādena nyastaṃ tac cen na sādhyate /
T17vtrksopu:693: kiṃ sādhyam anyathāniṣṭaṃ bhaved vaiphalyam eva vā // iti
T17vtrksopu:694: atra kecid āhuḥ satyam asty eva vaiphalyaṃ hetoḥ pṛthagdūṣaṇaṃ /
T17vtrksopu:695: yat punar asiddhaviruddhānaikāntikakathanaṃ viniścayādau tad asāmarthyaprabhedena /
T17vtrksopu:700: syād etad yadi vaiyarthyaṃ nāma hetor dūṣaṇaṃ syāt kiṃ tu pramāṇasya /
T17vtrksopu:702: adhigatam api gamayatā pramāṇena piṣṭaṃ piṣṭaṃ syād iti /
T17vtrksopu:705: karmaṇy aindriyam anyad vā sādhanaṃ kim itīṣyata iti
T17vtrksopu:706: tataś ca katham idaṃ vaiyarthyaṃ hetor dūṣaṇam /
T17vtrksopu:707: (Ts 305) athaivam ucyate pramāṇājanakatvād dhetur api vyartha ucyata iti /
T17vtrksopu:708: evaṃ hi vāstavam idaṃ hetor na dūṣaṇaṃ syāt /
T17vtrksopu:711: yadi vaiyarthyaṃ hetor dūṣanaṃ bhinnaṃ syāt /
T17vtrksopu:715: tathā vaiyarthyapratipakṣeṇāpy anyad rūpam uktaṃ syāt /
T17vtrksopu:717: yadi tarhīdaṃ vaiyarthyaṃ na pṛthagdūṣaṇaṃ kathaṃ tarhy anena vādī nigṛhyate //
T17vtrksopu:724: nedaṃ hetor dūṣaṇaṃ kiṃ tu parārthānumāne vaktur api guṇadoṣāś cintyante iti viphalābhidhāyī apratibhayaiva nigṛhyata iti /
T17vtrksopu:725: tathā hi prakṛtam eva sādhyaṃ nāprakṛtam iti sādhyatāyāḥ prakṛter niyāmaka eṣa panthā /
T17vtrksopu:727: doṣāḥ punar nyūnatvam asiddhir vādinā sādhayitum iṣṭasyārthasya viparyayasādhanam aṣṭādaśa dṛṣṭāntadoṣāś ceti /
T17vtrksopu:728: atra ca yac codyaṃ parihāraśca tad granthavistarabhayān na likhitam iti /
T17vtrksopu:730: yadi vaiyarthyaṃ hetor dūṣaṇaṃ tadāsiddha evāntarbhavati /
T17vtrksopu:732: 18. triIakṣaṇo hetur uktas tāvatārthapratītir iti na pṛthag dṛṣṭānto nāma sādhanāvayavaḥ kaścit /
T17vtrksopu:733: tena nāsya lakṣaṇaṃ pṛthag ucyate gatārthatvāt /
T17vtrksopu:734: hetoḥ sapakṣa eva sattvam asapakṣāc ca sarvato vyāvṛttī rūpam uktam abhedena i punar aviśeṣeṇa kāryasvabhāvayor janmatanmātrānubandhau darśanīyāv uktau /
T17vtrksopu:736: hetoḥ sapakṣa eva sattvam iti sādhyenānugatam idam ekaṃ rūpam asapakṣāc ca sarvato vyāvṛttir iti sādhyanivṛttyā nivṛttir asya dvitīyaṃ rūpam uktam /
T17vtrksopu:740: tac ca darśayatā dhūmas tatrāgnir iti asaty agnau na kvacid dhumo yathā mahānasetarayoḥ /
T17vtrksopu:741: yatra kṛtakatvaṃ tatrānityatvam anityatvābhāve kṛtakatvāsaṃbhavo yathā ghaṭākāśayor iti darśanīyam /
T17vtrksopu:742: na hy anyathā sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sadasattve yathoktaprakāre śakye darśayituṃ /
T17vtrksopu:744: tasyāgnyādeḥ kāryaṃ tatkāryaṃ tasya bhāvas tatkāryatā /
T17vtrksopu:745: na hy anyathā śakyo darśayitum iti liṅgavacanavipariṇāmena sambandhanīyam //
T17vtrksopu:746: 19. asmiṃś cārthe darśite darśita eva dṛṣṭānto bhavati /
T17vtrksopu:749: etenaiveti hetulakṣaṇābhidhānenaiva dṛṣṭāntasyāpi sāmarthyād gatārthatvena dṛṣṭāntadoṣā (Ts 307)
T17vtrksopu:751: yena hetoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ yathoktaṃ pradarśyate sa saṃyagdṛṣṭāntaḥ /
T17vtrksopu:752: yena punas tasya lakṣaṇadvayaṃ na pradarśyate so dṛṣṭāntābhāsa ity uktaṃ bhavati /
T17vtrksopu:756: atra hi karmaṇi nityatvaṃ sādhyadharmo nāsti /
T17vtrksopu:769: rathyāpuruṣe vacanaṃ pratyakṣeṇaiva niścitam iti sādhanadharmas tatra siddhaḥ /
T17vtrksopu:773: rathyāpuruṣe maraṇadharmatvaṃ sādhyadharma utpattimattvādinā liṅgena niścitaṃ rāgādimattvaṃ tv aniścitam iti saṃdigdhasādhanadharmā /
T17vtrksopu:777: yatra sādhyena hetor vyāptir nāsti so 'nanvayaḥ /
T17vtrksopu:780: na hi rāgādīnāṃ vacanasya tādātmyalakṣaṇas tadutpattilakṣano vā pratibandho 'sti yenātrānvayaḥ (Ts 308) syāt /
T17vtrksopu:784: na tu vacanenākhyāta ity avidyamāna ivāsau /
T17vtrksopu:788: atra hi yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityam ity anvaye vaktavye yad anityaṃ tat kṛtakam iti viparītam anvayaṃ karoti sarva ete dṛṣṭāntadoṣāḥ sādharmyeṇa
T17vtrksopu:808: saṃdigdhasādhanvyatirekaḥ yathā na trayīvidā brāhmaṇena grāhyavacanaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimattvāt /
T17vtrksopu:810: ye grāhyavacanā na te rāgādimantas tad yathā gautamādayo dharmaśāstrāṇāṃ praṇetāraḥ /
T17vtrksopu:823: yatra vītarāgatvaṃ nāsti na sa vaktā yathopalakhaṇḍa iti /
T17vtrksopu:825: tathāpi sarvo vītarāgo na vakteti vyāptyā vyatirekāsiddher avyatirekaḥ /
T17vtrksopu:827: yathānityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ākāśavad iti vaidharmyeṇa /
T17vtrksopu:828: yo hy anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād iti prayoge vaidharmyeṇākāśavad iti brūyāt tena vidyamāno 'pi vyatireko na pradarśitaḥ tathā /
T17vtrksopu:829: yadāśeṣapadārthopasaṃhāreṇānityatvābhāve kṛtakatvābhāvo yathākāśavad iti karoti tadā vyatireko darśito bhavati /
T17vtrksopu:833: atra hi yan nityaṃ tad akṛtakam iti vaktavye /
T17vtrksopu:834: yad akṛtakaṃ tan nityam iti vadati //
T17vtrksopu:835: 21. na hy ebhir dṛṣṭāntābhāsair hetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sapakṣa eva sattvam asapakṣe cāsattvam eva niścayena śakyaṃ darśayituṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ vā /
T17vtrksopu:836: ebhiḥ sādhyavikalair dṛṣṭāntābhāsair hetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ niścayena na śakyaṃ darśayituṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ veti saṃbandhanīyaṃ tadarthāpattyaiṣāṃ nirāso veditavyaḥ /
T17vtrksopu:837: yasmād ebhir dṛṣṭāntābhāsair dvividham api lakṣaṇaṃ na śakyaṃ darśayitum /
T17vtrksopu:843: dṛṣṭāntadoṣāś ca gṛhyante ye pūrvaṃ nyūnatādayaḥ sādhanadoṣā uktās teṣām udbhāvanaṃ tena pareṣṭārthasiddhipratibandhāt /
T17vtrksopu:844: anena ca yad ahrīkeṇoktaṃ viparyayasādhanam eva dūṣaṇaṃ nānyad iti tad api parāstaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ /
T17vtrksopu:848: niścayābhāvo vā bhavati niścayaviparyaya ity asty eva viparyayasiddhiḥ /
T17vtrksopu:854: yat tarkasopānam idaṃ vidhāya puṇyaṃ mayāptaṃ śaradinduśubhram /
T17vtrksopu:855: tenottamāṃ bodhim ahaṃ labheya lokaś ca niryātu bhavād aśeṣaḥ //
